content.raw:
Hey guys,

I am moving to the Physical host from docker due to slow response. I am following the below link,

‌

But not able to build it. When I do catkin\_make install, i get below errors,

`[ 96%] Building CXX object subt/subt_ros/CMakeFiles/pose_tf_broadcaster.dir/src/pose_tf_broadcaster.cpp.o`

`[ 97%] Linking CXX executable /home/baila/subt_ws/devel/lib/subt_ros/pose_tf_broadcaster`

`[ 97%] Built target pose_tf_broadcaster`

`Scanning dependencies of target subt_ros_relay`

`[ 98%] Building CXX object subt/subt_ros/CMakeFiles/subt_ros_relay.dir/src/SubtRosRelay.cc.o`

`[100%] Linking CXX executable /home/baila/subt_ws/devel/lib/subt_ros/subt_ros_relay`

`/usr/bin/ld: CMakeFiles/subt_ros_relay.dir/src/SubtRosRelay.cc.o: undefined reference to symbol '_ZN6google8protobuf5Arena11AddListNodeEPvPFvS2_E'`

`//usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libprotobuf.so.10: error adding symbols: DSO missing from command line`

`collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status`

`subt/subt_ros/CMakeFiles/subt_ros_relay.dir/build.make:131: recipe for target '/home/baila/subt_ws/devel/lib/subt_ros/subt_ros_relay' failed`

`make[2]: *** [/home/baila/subt_ws/devel/lib/subt_ros/subt_ros_relay] Error 1`

`CMakeFiles/Makefile2:4006: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ros/CMakeFiles/subt_ros_relay.dir/all' failed`

`make[1]: *** [subt/subt_ros/CMakeFiles/subt_ros_relay.dir/all] Error 2`

`Makefile:140: recipe for target 'all' failed`

`make: *** [all] Error 2`

`Invoking "make install -j4 -l4" failed`

`baila@baila-PC:~/subt_ws$`

‌

Any help?
content.html:
Hey guys,

I am moving to the Physical host from docker due to slow response. I am following the below link,

‌

But not able to build it. When I do catkin_make install, i get below errors,

[ 96%] Building CXX object subt/subt_ros/CMakeFiles/pose_tf_broadcaster.dir/src/pose_tf_broadcaster.cpp.o

Scanning dependencies of target subt_ros_relay

[ 98%] Building CXX object subt/subt_ros/CMakeFiles/subt_ros_relay.dir/src/SubtRosRelay.cc.o
